flawed_nl_solution:
Daria wants to buy tickets for 4 persons, so the cost will be 4 tickets * $90/ticket = $<<4*90=630>>630.
Daria currently has $189, so she needs $630 - $189 = $<<630-189=441>>441 more.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 360, not 630. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
